text: Marital misconduct is a legal term, which applies to married people. If one of them behaves in a way that is bad for the marriage, this is seen as marital misconduct. Common examples of marital misconduct are: * Having sex with other people, without the partner knowing and agreeing; this is usually called adultery. * Becoming addicted to drugs or alcohol * Being violent towards the partner or family, usually called domestic violence Such behaviors are often seen as a reason to get a divorce, which will will end the marriage. Category:Family law
title: Marital misconduct
